- (NSString * EC2S3Storage.)description

- (id EC2S3Storage.)init  

Default constructor for a new object.

Callers should use the property methods to initialize this object after creating it.

Property Documentation

- (NSString *) bucket [read, write, retain]

The bucket in which to store the AMI.

You can specify a bucket that you already own or a new bucket that Amazon EC2 creates on your behalf.

If you specify a bucket that belongs to someone else, Amazon EC2 returns an error.
